rationale: Restructured mixed pediatric emergency narrative into disease-specific diagnostic and management map with age-based triage.
Kept Reye and malnutrition high-yield mechanisms; removed motivational/transition text.
Converted bariatric counseling narrative into criteria and complication algorithms (leak/stenosis/gallstones).
Preserved Billroth, dumping, Nissen, Whipple, and blind-loop pathophysiology in table/decision format.
Trimmed recap to actionable post-op complication decisions and preserved trauma transition principle.
Rebuilt blunt and penetrating trauma sections into hemodynamics-first OR-vs-CT algorithm.
Maintained penetrating trauma criteria, rib injury localization, and pancreatic retroperitoneal pitfall.
Retained pancreatic injury workup and contrasted duodenal perforation vs hematoma management.
Separated duodenal hematoma conservative care from splenic rupture stability-based intervention.
Kept Fothergill/dehiscence/pilonidal recognition and treatment while removing filler.
Recap normalized to cut-vs-wait trauma decision table and removed unrelated section intro.
Focused GI bleed line on stabilization, transfusion logic, upper-vs-lower clues, and variceal pathway.
